Footer.site_description: Velcure is a platform for Clinics and Hospitals to manage their patient transportation.

hosting.title: Hosted in Germany
hosting.description: All data is hosted in Germany and is subject to the strict German data protection laws. Our Servers are ISO 27001 certified.

security.title: Secure
security.description: We use the latest security standards to ensure that your data is safe and secure.

gdpr.title: DSGVO
gdpr.description: We are fully compliant with the European General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

hero.eyebrow: The Future of Medical Transport Booking
hero.heading: Book Medical Transports Seamlessly
hero.description: Velcure revolutionizes medical transport booking for healthcare facilities. Our user-friendly platform empowers you to conveniently find and book the right ambulance for patient transfers.

section_market.heading: Connect With Qualified Providers
section_market.description1: The Velcure Marketplace allows medical facilities to access an extensive network of accredited ambulance providers. Easily submit transport requests and get matched with qualified partner services in your area for fulfillment.
section_market.description2: Verified, integrated providers ensure the highest standards of safety and quality. Real-time visibility and centralized coordination enables a smooth hand-off for each trip.
section_market.description3: Expand your service reach through trusted, reliable providers on the Velcure Marketplace. We facilitate the connections so you can focus on patient care.

recurring_bookings.headline: Recurring Bookings
recurring_bookings.description1: Velcure makes setting up recurring ambulance transports simple. Our series booking feature allows you to schedule regular trips like dialysis or chemotherapy in just a few clicks.
recurring_bookings.description2: Velcure automatically generates all associated tours based on your specifications. No need for repetitive manual entry.
recurring_bookings.description3: The dashboard provides an overview of upcoming recurring trips. Easily modify, reschedule or cancel individual bookings as needed. Changes sync across the series.
recurring_bookings.description4: With Velcure's series booking tool, regular ambulance transports can be scheduled quickly without contacting providers separately each time. The automated feature simplifies recurring transport management.

one.title: Simplify Patient Profiles
one.description: Velcure allows you to easily create, manage, and reuse patient profiles for streamlined transport booking. Key demographic and medical data can be imported from your hospital IT system via API integration. Profiles are saved for future access, eliminating redundant data entry.

two.title: Seamless System Integration
two.description: Connect Velcure to your existing hospital IT infrastructure to enable quick importing of patient information into transport profiles. Robust APIs and connections allow patient data to flow seamlessly between systems. This saves time and ensures accurate up-to-date records.

three.title: Secure Access and Controls
three.description: Patient profiles and data are protected by granular access permissions. Usage activity and changes are logged for auditing.

featureGrid.headline: Streamlined Features for Efficient Processes
featureGrid.description: Velcure provides medical facilities with important functions to optimize workflows around medical transports.

1.title: Simple Booking.
1.description: Quickly and easily book ambulance transports online without manual effort.

2.title: Customizable Bookings.
2.description: Flexibly reschedule or cancel individual trips within a series as needed.

3.title: Recurring Bookings.
3.description: Set up regular trips like dialysis as recurring booking series.

4.title: Proposed Timeslots.
4.description: Suggest suitable alternative timeslots if requested by the provider.

5.title: Incoming Trips.
5.description: View and manage all incoming transport requests in one place.

6.title: Automated Updates.
6.description: Automatically notify relevant parties about status changes like delays.

cta-customizing.headline: Tailored to Your Needs
cta-customizing.description: Velcure can be customized to your specific requirements. Missing an integration? Need company-specific adjustments? Our development team is happy to assist with realizing customization requests.
